nodes.title: Open Source and online accounting software
nodes.summary: Open Source and online accounting software

product.summary: A suite of web based open source business apps
Open Source and online accounting software

overview.overview: Akaunting is a free, open source and online accounting software designed for small businesses and freelancers.

childMarkdownRemark.html: Online accounting software designed for small businesses and freelancers. Akaunting is built with modern technologies such as Laravel, VueJS, Tailwind, RESTful API etc. Thanks to its modular structure, Akaunting provides an awesome App Store for users and developers.
